description: Try our easy to follow Mixed Bean Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Mixed Bean Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Blanch broad beans, sugar snap peas and beans in boiling, salted water for 3 minutes or until just tender. Drain and place in ice water for 5 minutes. Drain. Remove outer skin of broad beans.

Combine broad beans, peas, beans, spinach, herbs and feta in a large serving bowl. Add reserved oil, lemon juice, vinegar, mustard, salt and pepper into a screw top jar and shake to combine. Drizzle dressing over salad. Serve.
